item.description:
Hi incubators!! Lots of action this week for all of you to check out.

Next Saturday, come check out Lost Marbles do their improv schtick at the Spiegel Auditorium in Harvard Square.

This troupe includes some of your organizers and fellow incubators, Lisa, Sandy, Robin, Ben, and myself.

If that's not enough to get you to come out....it's only a $5 show!!!!! That's cheaper than pretty much about anything you are going to do for a hour and half in Boston. So come with your best giddy laughing faces on and drag along your friends while your at it.

I mean i guarantee at least one laugh by just looking at me on stage.

Any questions? Just get in touch with me.

Any answers? Please tell me I'm dying to know.

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: all the world's a stage, I'll meet you all there.
item.name: Come check out some of the incubators perform!!! Lost Marbles Live!!!
